name: Remove An Attribute
function_list: remove_attributes(image_id: str, classname: str, attributes: list) -> dict
description: Removes specified attributes from a given class (concept) in the image.
example_questions: Can you remove [attribute name] from [object name] class?
Can you remove [attribute name] from [object name] concept?

tools: remove_attributes(image_id: str, classname: str, attributes: list) -> dict
action_list.content: Generate the code to remove the attribute from the object
From the results, check if the attribute has been removed from the object
